title: Data from Argentina's Population Census
text: project supported rOpenSci Champions Program 2023-2024, Andrea Gomez Vargas main developer, Emanuel Ciardullo co-author Luis D. Verde Arregoitia mentor. arcenso package development allow access official data national population censuses Argentina National Institute Statistics Census - INDEC. Currently, results historical censuses 1970, 1980, 1991, 2001, 2010 2022 available different formats physical books, PDFs, Excel files REDATAM, without unified system format allows working data six census periods database. addition, presentation data homogeneous periods, making difficult make historical serial comparisons available information. package aims make census data available, homogenized ready use. include census data 1970 2022. package census information allow public private sectors, citizens actors society access current historical information Argentinaâ€™s population, households housing accessible way. available data added package stages shown table year geographic disaggregation. Currently, package stage 1 roadmap.

title: Data from Argentina's Population Census
text: identified table need, use get_census() retrieve data. function returns list containing corresponding data frames:
code: # Download 1970 housing data census_data_1970 <- get_census(   year = 1970,    topic = "CONDICIONES HABITACIONALES",    geolvl = "Total del paÃ­s" )  # Preview the first table in the list head(census_data_1970[[1]]) #> # A tibble: 5 Ã— 4 #>   regimen_de_tenencia                 hogares personas cuartos  #>   <chr>                               <chr>   <chr>    <chr>    #> 1 Propietario                         3553250 13778700 11197900 #> 2 Inquilino o arrendatario            1380950 4692800  3305350  #> 3 Ocupante en relaciÃ³n de dependencia 353300  1402500  880050   #> 4 Ocupante gratuito                   575650  2271150  1196500  #> 5 En otro carÃ¡cter                    192950  816350   419800

title: Data from Argentina's Population Census
text: arcenso package includes built-interactive interface explore consult census tables without writing code. ideal quick data discovery browsing historical records. launch application locally, run:
code: # Launch the interactive Shiny application arcenso_gui()

what: Check available census tables â€” check_repository
title: Check available census tables â€” check_repository
text: Reports census tables currently available package consultation based provided filters.

title: Check available census tables â€” check_repository
Check available census tables â€” check_repository
text: year Census year (1970 1980). Default 1970. topic Census topic tables (e.g., "EDUCACION"). NULL, available topics selected year shown. geolvl Geographic disaggregation level (e.g., "Total del paÃ­s"). NULL, jurisdictions included.

what: Get census data tables â€” get_census
title: Get census data tables â€” get_census
text: Retrieves list curated data tables Argentina's official population censuses based specified filters.

title: Get census data tables â€” get_census
Get census data tables â€” get_census
text: year Census year (1970 1980). Default 1970. topic Census topic tables (e.g., "EDUCACION"). NULL, available topics year retrieved. geolvl Geographic disaggregation level (e.g., "Total del paÃ­s"). NULL, jurisdictions retrieved.

title: Get census data tables â€” get_census
text: list data frames containing requested census tables.

title: arcenso 0.1.0
text: 1970: national level 24 jurisdictions. 1980: national level . get_census() â€“ access available datasets. check_repository() â€“ list available sources. arcenso() â€“ Shiny app explore data interactively. ğŸŒ Online documentation site: ğŸ‘‰ https://soyandrea.github.io/arcenso version establishes stable foundation development. changes previous versions, first official release.
